115180.「装備品の登録で ございますね！\n こちらについては 少々 説明がございますの:
So you'd like to register some equipment! Let me explain a bit more about it.
The rules state you can register up to 100 pieces of equipment for your monsters to use.
If you change the effects of equipment you've previously registered, you'll need to re-register it to update its effects here.
Now then, please feel free to choose the equipment you'd like to register! Remember, you can only have up to 100!

272474.「あら？ <pc>様は 登録できる\n 装備品を お持ちではないようですわ。\n:
What's this? You don't have any equipment that
can be registered.
<end>

272475.「あら？ こちらの倉庫には 登録できる\n 装備品が 入っていないようですわ。\:
What's this? This storage doesn't have any
equipment that can be registered.
<end>

272487.「申し訳ないのですが\n ５キャラコースの登録が 確認できないので\n ５キャラ:
My apologies, but I can't confirm that you've
registered for the 5 Character Course, so you
cannot use the 5 Character storage.
<end>

272488.「申し訳ないのですが 倉庫拡張サービスの\n 追加倉庫＋１が 確認できないので\:
I'm sorry, but we cannot confirm that you are
using the Extra Storage +1 service. This extra
storage therefore cannot be used.
<end>
